snippet: Legislators are rightly alarmed that Gov. Andrew Cuomo is trying to severely limit the comptroller’s preauditing power. Good government needs checks and balances.
abstract: Editorial maintains New York legislators are rightly alarmed that Gov Andrew Cuomo's budget contains a measure that will severely limit the comptroller's power to audit state contracts before they are signed; contends New York's history of corruption and waste requires that someone in addition to the governor and his staff should be monitoring the way the state spends its money.
lead_paragraph: Legislators are rightly alarmed that Gov. Andrew Cuomo is trying to severely limit the comptroller’s preauditing power. Good government needs checks and balances.
